attributes.action: Every school & college to be obliged to have an evacuation chair & training
attributes.additional_details: Fires can spread very quickly.  Sign so disabled people feel safer!
attributes.background: I believe the government should make it a legal requirement for all schools and colleges to have evacuation chairs, and for all staff to be trained in using them.
